languages.text: "Иначе говоря, вы просиживаете штаны. Нас обоих обучали карательным тактикам, но именно у тебя не хватает мозгов применить знание к делу без ущерба для миссии".

traits.locale_text: "Иначе говоря, вы просиживаете штаны. Нас обоих обучали карательным тактикам, но именно у тебя не хватает мозгов применить знание к делу без ущерба для миссии".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."
languages.original_text: "Иначе говоря, вы просиживаете штаны. Нас обоих обучали карательным тактикам, но именно у тебя не хватает мозгов применить знание к делу без ущерба для миссии".

traits.locale_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your ass. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply it without compromising the mission."
"In other words, you are sitting on your ass. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply it without compromising the mission."
"In other words, you are sitting on your arse. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."
"In other words, you are sitting on your arse. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."
"In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."
"In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

languages.text: «Es decir, que no está haciendo nada. A ambos nos entrenaron en tácticas de castigo, pero usted no tiene la inteligencia necesaria para aplicarlas sin poner en riesgo la misión».
languages.original_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

traits.locale_text: «Es decir, que no está haciendo nada. A ambos nos entrenaron en tácticas de castigo, pero usted no tiene la inteligencia necesaria para aplicarlas sin poner en riesgo la misión».

languages.text: “换句话说，你仅仅是在袖手旁观而已。你我都接受过惩罚策略的相关训练，但你的脑子却不够机灵，无法在不影响任务的前提下灵活施加惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

traits.locale_text: “换句话说，你仅仅是在袖手旁观而已。你我都接受过惩罚策略的相关训练，但你的脑子却不够机灵，无法在不影响任务的前提下灵活施加惩罚。”

languages.text: 「つまり、何もしないということだ。我々は過酷な方法で訓練されたが、任務を危険にさらすことなく自分の頭を使う脳みそをもっていないということだ」
languages.original_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、何もしないということだ。我々は過酷な方法で訓練されたが、任務を危険にさらすことなく自分の頭を使う脳みそをもっていないということだ」

languages.text: « En d'autres termes, vous vous tournez les pouces au lieu d'intervenir. Nous avons tous deux été formés aux tactiques punitives, mais vous êtes incapable de les appliquer sans pour autant compromettre la mission. »
languages.original_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

traits.locale_text: « En d'autres termes, vous vous tournez les pouces au lieu d'intervenir. Nous avons tous deux été formés aux tactiques punitives, mais vous êtes incapable de les appliquer sans pour autant compromettre la mission. »

languages.text: "Yani kılınızı kıpırdatmadan oturuyorsunuz. İkimiz de cezalandırma taktikleri konusunda eğitim aldık fakat bunları vazifeni riske atmadan uygulamaya kafası basmıyor."
languages.original_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

traits.locale_text: "Yani kılınızı kıpırdatmadan oturuyorsunuz. İkimiz de cezalandırma taktikleri konusunda eğitim aldık fakat bunları vazifeni riske atmadan uygulamaya kafası basmıyor."

languages.text: "Mit anderen Worten, Ihr sitzt da und dreht Däumchen. Wir wurden beide in Straftaktiken geschult, aber Euch mangelt es am nötigen Verstand, um sie umzusetzen, ohne die Mission zu gefährden."
languages.original_text: "In other words, you are sitting on your hands. We both were trained in punitive tactics, but you are the one who doesn't have the brains to apply them without compromising the mission."

traits.locale_text: "Mit anderen Worten, Ihr sitzt da und dreht Däumchen. Wir wurden beide in Straftaktiken geschult, aber Euch mangelt es am nötigen Verstand, um sie umzusetzen, ohne die Mission zu gefährden."
